news.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, who last year imposed a strict lockdown on short notice, asked states to avoid shutting businesses as India grapples with a new wave of Covid-19 infections that threatens a nascent economic revival.

news.title: PM Modi In Hyderabad For Big Event, Chief Minister KCR Skips Airport Welcome - NDTV
news.description: For the second time in as many months, Prime Minister Narendra Modi was not received at the airport by the state Chief Minister. This time Telangana Chief Minister KCR skipped welcoming the Prime Minister as he landed in Hyderabad.
